ee.ria.dhx.server.service

Class SoapService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.ria.dhx.server.service.SoapService

  • @Service
 @Transactional
public class SoapService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that gets SOAP request objects(from DVK services), processes requests and gives SOAP response objects.
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

      Method processes sendDocuments request and saves the document into the database for further sending to DHX service of the recipient.
      void sendDocumentsToDhx()
      Method finds not sent documents that are meant to be sent to DHX(outgoing documents) and sends them using asynchronous DHX sender.

      • sendDocuments

        @Loggable
public SendDocumentsResponse sendDocuments(SendDocuments documents,
                                                      ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender,
                                                      ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient)
                                               throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method processes sendDocuments request and saves the document into the database for further sending to DHX service of the recipient.
        Parameters:
        documents - - SOAP request object
        sender - - sender of the request(from SOAP header)
        recipient - - recipient of the request(from SOAP header)
        Returns:
        - SOAP response object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • sendDocumentsToDhx

        @Loggable
public void sendDocumentsToDhx()
        Method finds not sent documents that are meant to be sent to DHX(outgoing documents) and sends them using asynchronous DHX sender.

      • saveRecipient

 @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)

      • receiveDocuments

        @Loggable
public ReceiveDocumentsResponse receiveDocuments(ReceiveDocuments request,
                                                            ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender,
                                                            ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient)
                                                     throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method returns documents that are sent to sender's organisation. Paramters from request are also used to find documents to return.
        Parameters:
        request - - SOAP request object
        sender - - sender of the request(from SOAP header)
        recipient - - recipient of the request(from SOAP header)
        Returns:
        - SOAP response object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • markDocumentReceived

        @Loggable
public MarkDocumentsReceivedResponse markDocumentReceived(MarkDocumentsReceived requestWrapper,
                                                                     ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember senderMember,
                                                                     ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipientMember,
                                                                     org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext context)
                                                              throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method marks documents with status provided in request. Documents which will be marked are parameters provided in request.
        Parameters:
        requestWrapper - SOAP request object
        senderMember - sender of the request(from SOAP header)
        recipientMember - recipient of the request(from SOAP header)
        context - SOAP context, used for attachment parsing
        Returns:
        SOAP response object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • getSendStatus

        @Loggable
public GetSendStatusResponse getSendStatus(GetSendStatus request,
                                                      ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember senderMember,
                                                      ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipientMember,
                                                      org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext context)
                                               throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method returns statuses of the documents. Documents are found by the parameters provided in request.
        Parameters:
        request - - SOAP request object
        senderMember - - sender of the request(from SOAP header)
        recipientMember - - recipient of the request(from SOAP header)
        context - Soap message context
        Returns:
        - SOAP response object
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown if error occurs

      • getSendingOptions

        @Loggable
public GetSendingOptionsResponse getSendingOptions(GetSendingOptions request,
                                                              ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember senderMember,
                                                              ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipientMember,
                                                              org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext context)
                                                       throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method returns list of organisations that are able to receive the documents using DHX protocol.

      • deleteOldDocuments

        @Loggable
public void deleteOldDocuments(java.lang.Boolean deleteWholeDocument)
                                   throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method deletes documents or content of the documents older than configured lifetime of the received and failed documents. Documents with status INPROCESS are not deleted.
        Parameters:
        deleteWholeDocument - delete whole document from database or only content.
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - thrown when error occurs
